::KitKat::
She opened her link, "ALL BOTS OUT OF THE BASE NOW! MOVE IT! YOU'VE 
GOT 30 SECONDS!"

She activated the transport pod by remote and had it land near her. 
The supplies were loaded. DarkMouse was already next to her. 
GoldenEye got the transmission and ran over to the pod. 

"GET OUT OF THE BASE NOW! QUICKSTRIKE! DOLLEN! BLUDGEON! OBSIDIAN! 
WAR! FAMINE! DRILLBIT! THE BASE WILL BLOW IN 25 SECONDS, GET OUT NOW!"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> Destructor flew back to the base. He walked in and looked at his 
old ship. He 
> would miss it. He dl the last of the computer data and flew off. He 
had not 
> seen kit Kat but he sent a comm if she was in there.."Move Kit 
Kat..You got 
> about 30 sec before the base goes up."
